case.title: Do you want to meet ladies at a Charity event tonight? (Chelsea~)
case.text:
We have having a FABULOUS event in Chelsea tonight... for a special charity that helps orphan children.
We will have Bravo Stars from Reality TV shows attending...
If you want to meet some ladies, this is the place to be.
If you want to attend, please reply to this email with your FULL NAME, and EMAIL.
Craigslist blocks emails. We will not spam you. This is a charity event. If you do not provide your name and email, we will not forward the invitation.
It's $10 to enter. Attire is Business Casual/Business. Men and women will be coming from the office, some may be dressed more nicely. NO SNEAKERS or casual attire.
